definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: By using the method provided by the invention, the soap containing the tannin can be prepared.
sentences.chinese: 利用本發明提供的方法，可製備含有單寧酸的香皂。

sentences.english: Tannic variety that has suprisingly has produced a wonderful style of rose.
sentences.chinese: 多種單寧酸種類，非常棒的玫瑰香風格。

sentences.english: Because of its naturally lower levels of tannins, it is considered to be an excellent wine for oak treatment.
sentences.chinese: 由於其單寧酸含量低，最好用橡木來儲存。

sentences.english: A colorless crystalline acid obtained from tannin.
sentences.chinese: 一種無色的晶狀酸，從單寧酸中提取。

sentences.english: Deep ruby-red coloured wine , of excellent structure, harmonious with soft tannins.
sentences.chinese: 深紅寶石色，結構感優異，柔順的單寧酸。

sentences.english: Different individuals, or genotypes, of cottonwoods have different levels of tannins.
sentences.chinese: 不同的白楊木個體或基因型都含有不同濃度的單寧酸。

sentences.english: Smell: into the rich fruit aromas, with fine tannins.
sentences.chinese: 滲入複雜豐富的果實香味，帶有細膩的單寧酸。

sentences.english: Tannins are chemicals that are found in the skin and seeds of grapes.
sentences.chinese: 單寧酸是來自於葡萄果皮和籽兒的化學物。

sentences.english: Red wine specifically contains tannin, which can inhibit bacterial growth.
sentences.chinese: 紅酒含有單寧酸，有效抑制細菌滋長。

sentences.english: Do not feed gallic acid or tannic acid to laying hens.
sentences.chinese: 在產蛋雞日糧中不要使用沒食子酸和單寧酸。

sentences.english: The old tailor was barking leather in his store.
sentences.chinese: 那個老裁縫正在他的店中用樹皮中的單寧酸製革。
